text: Hulu’s new TV and movie releases for January 13-19, 2025 include the films A Real Pain and My Penguin Friend. My Penguin Friend drops on Hulu on January 14. Directed by David Schurmann, the story follows the meeting between a penguin, rescued from an oil spill, and a heartbroken fisherman. The penguin and fisherman soon form a friendship that brings a positive aura to the latter’s life. The Jesse Eisenberg-directed film, A Real Pain, will be available on Hulu starting January 16. Starring Eisenberg and Kieran Culkin as cousins, the story follows their reunion for a tour in Poland to honor their grandmother. However, underlying tensions and their contrasting personalities threaten to complicate the journey. Also dropping this week on Hulu is Toilet Bound Hanako-kun Season 2. This anime series is based on the manga of the same name, written and illustrated by Iro and Aida, respectively. The story follows Nene Yashiro, a high school freshman and occultist who summons Hanako-san of the Toilet and gets him to grant her romantic wishes while also helping him destroy supernatural beings. The duo also work together to change rumors and balance the spirit and human worlds. html:
Hulu’s new TV and movie releases for January 13-19, 2025 include the films A Real Pain and My Penguin Friend.

My Penguin Friend drops on Hulu on January 14. Directed by David Schurmann, the story follows the meeting between a penguin, rescued from an oil spill, and a heartbroken fisherman. The penguin and fisherman soon form a friendship that brings a positive aura to the latter’s life.

The Jesse Eisenberg-directed film, A Real Pain, will be available on Hulu starting January 16. Starring Eisenberg and Kieran Culkin as cousins, the story follows their reunion for a tour in Poland to honor their grandmother. However, underlying tensions and their contrasting personalities threaten to complicate the journey.

Also dropping this week on Hulu is Toilet Bound Hanako-kun Season 2. This anime series is based on the manga of the same name, written and illustrated by Iro and Aida, respectively. The story follows Nene Yashiro, a high school freshman and occultist who summons Hanako-san of the Toilet and gets him to grant her romantic wishes while also helping him destroy supernatural beings. The duo also work together to change rumors and balance the spirit and human worlds.

New Hulu releases for January 13-19, 2025

Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to Hulu from January 13-19 2025.

January 13

  • Toilet Bound Hanako-kun: Season 2 Premiere (SUBBED)
  • Biography: WWE Legends: Complete Season 2
  • The First 48: Complete Season 25
  • The Mega-Brands That Built America: Complete Season 2
  • Murder At The Motel: Complete Season 1
  • Quarter Ton Teen: Complete Season 1

January 14

  • My Penguin Friend (2024)

January 15

  • Unmasked: Complete Season 1 (SUBBED & DUBBED)
  • Sniper: The Ultimate Competition: Complete Season 1

January 16

  • A Real Pain (2024)

January 17

  • Roy Wood Jr.: Lonely Flowers: Special Premiere
  • The Bad Shepard (2024)

For more Hulu content, learn when Shoresy Season 4 is dropping on the platform. Also, here is our interview with Shifting Gears’ Seann William Scott and Daryl “Chill” Mitchell.
